doc:
Lyle Waggoner https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lyle_Waggoner 0 Lyle Wesley Waggoner (; born April 13, 1935) is an American actor and former model, known for his work on The Carol Burnett Show from 1967 to 1974, and for playing the role of Steve Trevor and Steve Trevor Jr. on Wonder Woman from 1975 to 1979. Lyle_Wesley_Waggoner ( ; born April_13_,_1935 ) is an_American_actor and former_model , known for his_work on The_Carol_Burnett_Show from 1967 to 1974 , and for playing the_role of Steve_Trevor and Steve_Trevor_Jr. on Wonder_Woman from 1975 to 1979 .
